version_description:
1. The mysterious gameplay Battle Royale is going to be launched, ready to join the battlefield to win the championship!
2. Use the new tool Scoreboard to create brand new gameplay with your friends!
3. Join the Fishing game and discover new friends quickly!

1. The new room gameplay allows you and your friends to have fun time!
2. New visitor records, know who cares about you.
3. Now, you can invite your friends to join together by WhatsApp, and you can invite your friends in the App to party together.
4. Bug fixed.

1. New voice bio! Find the right person with your voice;
2. There are some changes for the room feature. You can receive your friends' private chats even when you are in the room;
3. A more simplified theme center, saving your time and data traffic;
